use nyc_taxi_discovery;
-- Selecting specific file
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


-- Selecting from a folder
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


    SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

--- Selecting data from sub folders

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


--- Select for a couple of months not all
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
               'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


    -- Use more wildcard chrater

SELECT
    TOP 100 *

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


    -------------------------------------------------------
    ---- File Metadata functions (filename())
    -----------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
    TOP 100 result.filename() AS file_name, result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT 
    result.filename() AS file_name, 
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY result.filename()
    ORDER BY result.filename()


SELECT 
    result.filename() AS file_name, 
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-02.csv')
    GROUP BY result.filename()
    ORDER BY result.filename()



    --- FILEPATH function
    SELECT 
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath() AS file_path, 
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-02.csv')
    GROUP BY result.filepath(),result.filename() 
    ORDER BY result.filepath()


-- get the year using filepath
SELECT 
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.filepath(1) AS year, 
    result.filepath(2) AS month, 
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-02.csv')
    GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)
    ORDER BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)

---- for analysis
    SELECT 
    result.filepath(1) AS year, 
    result.filepath(2) AS month, 
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)
    ORDER BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)


----

   SELECT 
    result.filepath(1) AS year, 
    result.filepath(2) AS month, 
    COUNT(1) as record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
    WHERE result.filepath(1) = 2020 AND result.filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08')
    GROUP BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)
    ORDER BY result.filename(),result.filepath(1) , result.filepath(2)
